entry.title: iamjohncaleb/Node-js-Microservices: **Node.js Microservice Boilerplate** A lightweight and scalable Node.js microservice built with Express.js, following best practices for modularity, security, and performance. Includes API routing, request validation, logging, and Docker support for easy deployment. 🚀
entry.content: **Node.js Microservice Boilerplate** A lightweight and scalable Node.js microservice built with Express.js, following best practices for modularity, security, and performance. Includes API routing, request validation, logging, and Docker support for easy deployment. 🚀

entry.title: nenadSB/Contacts-Management-App: A lightweight and stylish Angular application for managing contacts, built with standalone components and Sass for sleek, maintainable styling. Easily add, edit, delete, and search contacts with a clean and intuitive interface. Features include real-time filtering, form validation, and responsive design.
entry.content: A lightweight and stylish Angular application for managing contacts, built with standalone components and Sass for sleek, maintainable styling. Easily add, edit, delete, and search contacts with a clean and intuitive interface. Features include real-time filtering, form validation, and responsive design.

entry.title: nodebysam/TestLab.js: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!
entry.content: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!
